thread.title: Grizzlies offer regional Grind City fans new ways to stay connected with the latest Grizzlies news and updates
thread.title_full: Grizzlies offer regional Grind City fans new ways to stay connected with the latest Grizzlies news and updates

author: Roy Wells
title: Grizzlies offer regional Grind City fans new ways to stay connected with the latest Grizzlies news and updates
text:
Grizzlies offer regional Grind City fans new ways to stay connected with the latest Grizzlies news and updates   fans in the Greater Grind City areas of Nashville, Tenn., Jackson, Tenn., Jackson, Miss., St. Louis and Little Rock, Ark. can now follow, connect and get the most up-to-date news on all things Memphis Grizzlies in their respective areas. 
Fans have the opportunity to connect with other members of Grizz Nation at regional watch parties in their area by visiting Grizzlies.com/watchparties for select matchups and game times. 
Upcoming Grizzlies watch parties are as follows: Nashville, TN – Friday, Feb. 3 vs. Oklahoma City Thunder at Double Dogs, Sylvan Heights (4017 Charlotte Ave) St. Louis, MO – Monday, Feb. 6 vs. San Antonio Spurs, location TBD. The event will be hosted by Chris Denman & Travis Terrell of We Are Live! on 590 The Fan KFNS. Tune into the show for more details or check online at Grizzlies.com Jackson, TN – Wednesday, Feb. 8 vs. Phoenix Suns at Redbone's Grill & Bar (584 Carriage House Dr.) Jackson, TN – Monday, March 6 vs. Brooklyn Nets at Redbone's Grill & Bar (584 Carriage House Dr.) Nashville, TN – Monday, March 13 vs. Milwaukee Bucks at Double Dogs, Sylvan Heights (4017 Charlotte Ave) Nashville, TN – Wednesday, April 5 vs. Oklahoma City Thunder at Double Dogs, Sylvan Heights (4017 Charlotte Ave) 
‘Like’   regional Facebook groups (@GrizzliesNashville, @GrizzliesStLouis, @GrizzliesJackson, @GrizzliesLittleRock and @GrizzliesJacksonMS) to receive event updates, watch party locations and times, game highlights and announcements within each city. 
The Memphis Grizzlies are also offering regional charter ticket packages to bring Grizz Nation members to FedExForum on Saturday, March 18 to cheer on the Grizzlies as they face the San Antonio Spurs at 8 p.m.
